DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective Part A compare change elasticity measurement baseline 3 month subject resurface tightening procedure . The secondary objective Part A develop baseline elasticity score age 18-35 , 36-50 , 51-65 Fitzpatrick skin type I-II , III-IV , V-VI . The primary objective Part B compare age scar surround tissue elasticity measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Skin Elasticity Measurements Face Surgical Scars Stratified Age Skin Type
DOC.criteria: Part A : Subject 1865 year age Subject schedule resurface tighten procedure do Standard Care ( Arm 1 , 25 subject ) . The subject willingness ability understand provide inform consent use tissue communicate investigator Part B : Subject 18 Subject linear surgical scar > 2cm . The subject willingness ability understand provide inform consent use tissue communicate investigator Part A , Group 1 : Subject planning cosmetic procedure do face 3 month participate study ( Arm 2 , 25 subject ) .
